document.full_text: a california photographer charged with killing four women whose first and last names began with the same letter is also being investigated in the unsolved murders of three girls in rochester, new york, police said on wednesday.
document.title: accused california serial killer investigated in new york
lines_and_colors: a california photographer charged with killing four women whose first and last names began with the same letter is also being investigated in the unsolved murders of three girls in rochester, new york, police said on wednesday.
